tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE BuildingMaterialsFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  rating INT,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE BuildingMaterialsFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaterialReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_date DATE,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ReviewComments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(50),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers_feedback(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers_feedback(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES CustomerFeedback(customer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id)
);
